c74object.name: abc.gaincontrol
c74object.description: abc.gaincontrol is an abstraction that outputs a message 'gain' followed by an amplitude value in dB (from -127 to +18 dB). It enables to control abc.mc.gain~ and abc.hoa.decoder~ objects.As a bpatcher, it includes one default value that is the gain value in dB when launching the patch.

objarg.name: gain
objarg.description: first argument is the initial gain in dB [init=0:min=-127:max=18:step=0.01]
